summary: Requested: Plate and Dragonbone replacers for the popular Eisenplatte armor.
descriptionHtml:
As requested, this mod allows [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1779]Eisenplatte[/url] to replace Dragonbone or Plate armor. Eisenplatte armor was originally designed and created by NPR for Oblivion, then ported by Invalidfate into Skyrim, and now I\'m adding replacers. Whew.

Invalidfate\'s Eisenplatte armor doesn\'t replace any armor. As a consequence, it is not able to be upgraded. This mod solves this problem.

Installation
---------------
1. Download and install [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1779]invalidfate\'s port[/url]. (You only need to install the texture folder from that archive. You do NOT need the meshes folder or the .ESP file.)
2. Download and install my mesh replacers. Choose to replace dragonbone, plate, or dragonscale armor with this armor. If you can\'t figure this step out I can\'t help you.
3. Equip dragonbone, plate, or dragonscale armor (whichever you unzipped) and you\'ll see this armor.

(Optional) If you want the white version, go to your \"Data\\textures\\R18PN\\Armor\\Eisen Platte Armor\" directory and rename all the files with \"_2\" to without \"_2\", and all the files without \"_2\" to have \"_2\". Essentially, switch the file names between those with \"_2\" and those without.

v1.1
-----
Includes the option for replacing Dragonscale, for light armor toons.
author: katalysis
